description: A play on legal terms 'charged' and 'let off' in a mischievous context.
title: Juvenile Judgment
n_1: Officer Dan stumbles upon two kids, one with a firework, the other with a battery.
c1_1: What are you two up to?
n_2: Dan examines the firework and battery.
c1_2: You know these could be dangerous?
n_3: Dan decides what to do with the items.
n_4: Kids giggle at the wordplay as Dan smiles.
c1_4: Exactly, but stay safe, you two!
